comments: 打開記錄連接並控制與該連接相關的所有資源的壽命。 }
與數據存儲的連接不同步。建立連接後，歷史學家將變得有效。如果連接失敗的錯誤將設置為某種錯誤信息。每個單獨的連接將創建自己的線程以編寫數據。無效的連接句柄將沖洗所有等待的寫入數據，然後終止線程，數據庫連接等。名稱空間參數可用於允許由多個應用程序或計算機或兩者共享相同的根存儲位置。

Uptimetagname參數可確保可以在同一歷史學家的一台服務器上與另一台服務器之間的storageName參數不同。沒有此參數，並且具有典型的歷史學家標籤配置，歷史名稱名稱源自歷史學家標籤的“存儲名稱”參數。如果該機器因機器而變化（例如，使用參數表達式來得出跨工作站的不同值），則可能導致對整體VTSCADA正常運行時間的不完整視圖，進而導致從歷史學家返回的數據不一致的數據，具體取決於工作人員的表現。
snippets: HistorianConnect(
ConnectionType, { A text keyword that indicates the storage
methodology required. Permitted values are FileDB for storage on a
local or networked hard drive, using the VTScada proprietary database
format. ODBC for storage using a local or networked DBMS, accessed via
ODBC drivers. The keywords are not case-sensitive. }
ConnectionString, { A text string that provides the information
required to connect to the database specified by the ConnectionType.
(Non-ASCII characters will be removed.) ConnectionType
ConnectionString FileDB The root path to the storage folder. If a
relative path is provided, then it is relative to the VTScada
installation directory ODBC Any valid ODBC connection string. This may
begin with DSN= to specify a data source name, or it may be a complete
connection string. }
FileDB { ODBC }

comments: 查詢歷史學家數據存儲，並返回一系列處理的記錄。對於大多數用途，建議使用GetTaghistory代替歷史學家。
snippets: HistorianGetData(
ConnectionHandle, { As returned by an HistorianConnect call. }
TagName, { A text string representing the desired table name. Engine
code may modify this to conform with storage limitations. }
Schema, { A text expression describing the schema from which to
retrieve data. }
Data, { A variable in which the data will be returned. This will be a
two-dimensional array representing the returned data, indexed by
[col][row]. If TPP is non-zero, the number of rows in the result set
will equal the value of the NumEntries parameter. If TPP is zero there
could be fewer rows than specified by NumEntries }
FieldNames, { Names of the fields. Typically "Value" for most tag
values, or "Value!" for tag attribute data. (Value! was introduced
with VTScada version 12 and is not available in legacy data. It cannot
be retrieved by SQL queries.) }
TPP, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the time span in
seconds for each array entry. Each array element will contain the data
which correspond exactly to this time period which corresponds to 0 or
more data points. If TPP is positive and FieldNames selects a text
value, the first entry which falls in a time is read and Mode is
ignored. If TPP is equal to 0, the data is read and placed in the
array on a one to one basis. If TPP is less than 0, an error will be
returned. }
StartTime, { Timestamp in UTC. The report will include values matching
and later than this time. }
EndTime, { Ending timestamp. Ignored if TPP is non-zero. The report
will include values less than and matching this value. }
NumEntries, { Number of log entries in the array (numEntriesRequested
- determined by Size or TPP parameters of Getlog) Use a negative value
to retrieve values in reverse chronological order. }
Modes, { Optional numeric expression giving the method of handling the
data. If TPP is greater than 0, the values that fall in each time span
will be represented as follows: Mode Data Collection 0 Time-weighted
average 1 Minimum in range 2 Maximum in range 3 Change in value over
the range 4 Value at start of range 5 TimeOfMinInRange 6
TimeOfMaxInRange 7 SumOfZtoNZTransitions 8 SumOfNonZeroTime 9
Totalizer. (Invalid is counted as zero) 10 Deprecated. Equivalent to
mode 4. 11 Difference between the start and end values of a range (see
following note) 12 Bitwise OR (see following note) 13 Bitwise AND (see
following note) 14 Value at end of range Mode 11: This is for hardware
that can count to a limited number, then rolls over to start a fresh
count. For example, a tag that counts equipment starts, but which can
only count from 0 to 15 before wrapping around to start again. This
gives a value of sixteen per roll-over since there must be one more
start after fifteen to have the roll-over occur. A graph of a very
simple case where there is a start every second would look like the
following: (Each rollover must be followed by a fresh start, not a
gradually declining value. If there are a series of declining values
then, because each is less than the previous, each counts as another
rollover.) The formula used is (RolloverCount * RolloverValue) +
(LastValidValue - FirstValidValue). Where, for any given time
interval: Rollovers are counted when a new value is smaller than the
last valid value. The RolloverValue is passed to the function in the
parameter StaleTime. LastValidValue starts with the last valid value
in the previous time interval (if any), and is updated with each new
valid value within the time interval. FirstValidValue starts with the
last valid value in the previous time interval (if any), and is
updated with only the first valid value found in the current time
span. Given this example, suppose that you want a count of starts in
each thirty-second interval. In the first interval there is no
previous valid value, one wrap-around and a last valid value of 12.
(1*16) + (12 - 0) = 28. This is an idealized case. Consider a more
realistic case where not all values are logged. (This may be due to
factors such as polling intervals, deadbands, hardware, etc.) The
following graph shows the same data where the orange dots represent
values obtained and logged and the gray line represents what really
happened: In the first 30 seconds there is one roll-over when the
value drops from 13 to 2. The first value is 0 and the last is 11. The
Historian will return 27: (1*16) + (11-0) = 27. The Historian will
return 30 for the period from 30 to 60. The first valid value (carried
from the previous period) is 11. The last valid value is 9 and there
are two roll-overs. (2*16) + (9-11) = 30. Modes 12 and 13: These are
intended to provide a summary of the bit-wise Historian value
attributes within a query. (Value attributes were added in VTScada
version 11.5 / 12.0) With mode 12, the first value is OR'd with zero,
and each successive value in the time period is OR'd with result of
the last comparison. From the result you will know whether any
particular attribute bit was set on any values within the period. With
mode 13, the first value is AND'd with a value having all bits set to
1 and each successive value is AND'd with the result of the last
comparison. From the result you will know whether any particular
attribute bit was set on all values within the period. In the case of
modes 5 and 6, FieldName should still be set to indicate the field on
which the mode is to act. The return values will be times indicating
the maximum or minimum in that field for each time span. If TPP is
less than or equal to 0, Mode is ignored. If the data is text, the
first entry in a given time range is used for the array entry and Mode
is ignored. It is possible to retrieve more than one mode in a single
GetTagHistory statement. To do this, pass an array of values in as the
Mode parameter. }

comments: 檢索有關特定歷史學家或所有歷史學家的信息。 }
snippets: HistorianGetInfo(
ConnectionHandle, { As returned by an HistorianConnect call. }
InfoType, { A numeric expression specifying the type of information to
be returned, as follows: InfoType Information requested 0 Counters. A
dictionary of dictionaries of dictionaries containing full counter
information for all sequences stored by this Historian. 1 Errors. A
dictionary of write or deletion errors that occurred in this Historian
since the last time GetInfo(Historian, 1) was called. 2 Overall write
queue count. The number of records in the write queue for all
Historians (ConnectionHandle parameter is ignored). 3 Overall records
stored. A rollover count of the records stored by all Historians
(ConnectionHandle parameter is ignored). This counter rolls over
(2^32) and therefore is only useful for performance diagnostics. It is
not a count of all records in storage. 4 Write queue count. The number
of records in the write queue for this Historian. 5 Records stored. A
rollover count of the records stored by this Historian. This counter
rolls over and therefore is only useful for performance diagnostics.
It is not a count of all records in storage. 6 Overall write queue
size. The approximate memory size of the write queue for all
Historians (ConnectionHandle parameter is ignored). }

comments: 從數據存儲中讀取一系列記錄。該範圍由提供的開始和最終計數器值指定。
數據將在操作完成後設置。錯誤代碼將在操作完成時設置。如果操作成功在一起，則將設置為零，架構和中-S參數定義了索引文件中的記錄子集，從中檢索了所需的計數器範圍中的數據。如果此過濾後的子集沒有數據，則不會返回。
snippets: HistorianReadRecords(
ConnectionHandle, { As returned by an HistorianConnect call. }
TagName, { A text string representing the desired table name. Engine
code may modify this to conform with storage limitations. }
Schema, { This is a textual representation of a schema structure. }
Data, { A variable in which the values will be returned. This will be
a single dimension array representing the Fields (columns). The
entries in the array will be an array of values (all fields will be
the same) and the size of one of these arrays gives the number of
records (rows) in the result set. }
Mid-S, { A 64 bit binary token. }
StartCounter, { Starting counter number. Starts counting at 1 rather
than zero. }
EndCounter, { Ending counter number. Starts counting at 1 rather than
zero. }
ErrorCode { FileDB or SQL DB error code returned. Defined error codes
are provided in the reference chapter. See: Historian Error Codes }

comments: 數據始終將附加到數據存儲，並且除非有史學家記錄，否則不會刪除或更換記錄。該函數返回最後寫的記錄的計數器值。注意：在函數返回時，尚未編寫數據。因為計數器是實際記錄號（filedb）或索引（SQL）（SQL），以下返回的計數器值將是基於待處理的記錄數量的計算值。除了定義列格式外，該架構還定義了將要編寫所提供數據的表的子集。雖然被認為是螺紋的，但此功能將記錄傳遞給另一個線程進行寫作後沒有生命週期。每個記錄將以一個比以前的計數器值大的計數器值表示，除非模式或MID-S與以前的寫入更改。在這種情況下，啟動了一個新的表/文件集。新表的計數器值總是從1開始。
snippets: HistorianWriteRecords(
ConnectionHandle, { As returned by an HistorianConnect call. }
TagName, { A text string representing the desired table name. Engine
code may modify this to conform with storage limitations. }
Schema, { This is a textual representation of a schema structure. }
Records, { Array of data. This is a single dimension array
representing the Fields (columns) to be written. Each entry in this
array may be either a single data value or an array of values. If any
entry is an array, then the size of the largest array gives the number
of records (rows) to be written. If any individual field is
underspecified, then a representation of INVALID is written for the
missing values. }
SequenceID { A 12-byte, binary token. }

pages：請參閱vscrollbar中的說明，將列替換為行。使用HSCrollbar模塊的自定義腳本圖形必須直接傳遞到窗口對像中才能作為鼠標輪轂消息的來源。通常，這是VSCrollbar模塊控制的窗口。請注意，HSCrollbar模塊本身使用本機Windows

snippets: System.HScrollBar(
Left, { Required. Any numeric expression for the left side coordinate
of the scrollbar. }
Top, { Required. Any numeric expression for the top coordinate of the
scrollbar. }
Width, { Required. Any numeric expression for the width of the
scrollbar in pixels. }
Steps, { Any numeric expression giving the number of steps in the
scrollbar. }
PageLen, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the number of steps
to jump per page. }
Position, { Optional numeric. This variable may be used to monitor or
set the current scroll position. }
StepSize, { Optional. Any numeric expression giving the number of

WindowObj { Used by the Anywhere client. Enables redirection to the

on many touchscreens you cannot interact directly with the scrollbar
therefore this object is needed to make it possible to scroll

comments: 請注意，httpsend是httpclient庫的一部分，該庫是系統庫的一部分，因此必須以system.httpclient.httpsend的形式使用（...響應結構包含以下字段：返迴響應代碼。為了獲得成功，或以下內容之一：-1：連接時間到-2：響應時間為-3：無效（非HTTP）響應-4：不完整的響應-5：不支持的傳輸
HTTPMAXDEFLATEDDATATAS將有效負載的最大大小指定為截斷的有效負載每秒鐘的最大請求將其默認為無限速度。

Filename, { Required. The relative path and file name of the image }
ColorMultiplier, { Optional color value in the form aRGB A colour
value, defined as four, two-digit hexadecimal values. Alpha - Red -
Green - Blue. An Alpha value of FFis assumed if only the RGB values
are provided. , used to apply a specific color to a gray-scale image.
Mirror, { Optional Boolean. A logical value that can be set to 1 to
reflect the image about the vertical axis. The default is no

AntiAlias, { Optional numeric. This is a bit-wise parameter where Bit
0 controls whether anti-aliasing will be done when the image is

Opacity, { Optional numeric expression for a multiplier to the
transparency (alpha value) of every color in the image. Range 0

Lightness, { Optional numeric expression that is a multiplier to the
brightness of the image. Range 0+. Defaults to 1 if missing or
invalid. }
Contrast, { Optional numeric expression to enhance the differences
between the colors in the image. Range 0+. Defaults to 1 if missing or
invalid. }
Hue, { Optional numeric expression for the hue rotation to apply to
all of the colors in the image. Range -180 to 180. The default is no

Saturation, { Optional numeric expression that is a multiplier to the

ColorizeIntensity, { Optional numeric expression for the intensity of

ColorizeHue { Optional numeric expression for the hue value of a color

comments: 讀取現有的圖像句柄，然後返回另一個包含從該手柄創建的圖像的圖像，沿著弧形路徑給定數量鋪平圖像。
結果是瓷磚的徑向陣列。繪製角度與瓷磚的中心相交。該路徑基於使用圖形變換的邊界框，橢圓的大小和形狀。縮放基於所述半徑和屏幕上轉換的最終大小的比較。在橢圓形的情況下，半徑被認為是最小的橢圓半徑。失敗後，返回無效的裁剪參數與夾子函數相反，夾子函數在鋪平發生之前將剪輯區域應用於圖像。

如果找到了源模塊的一個以上實例，則結果可能是不可預測的。返回調用模塊中發現具有相同名稱的變量數量，因此未從源模塊導入。

以這種方式構建陣列具有O（n^2）的複雜性，這意味著這是構建任何大小陣列的一種極慢的方法。將元素添加到字典中並使用ListKeys製作數組的效率要高得多，此函數旨在用於通過新功能創建的動態分配的數組。如果與已靜態聲明的數組一起使用，則除非在數組參數中另有說明，否則將使用數組的第一個元素，並且將在此元素中創建/添加動態分配的數組。

comments: 時間積分。此函數返回值的時間積分。 }
積分函數採用值參數，乘以經過的時間，並將其添加到迄今為止的累積值中。如果值從無效變為有效，則新的有效結果將開始為零。此函數是衍生的倒數。由於VTSCADA的評估方法不執行任何計算，除非參數的更改需要進行任何計算，否則時間參數是必要的。這意味著，如果值保持不變，則將在時間參數指定的時間間隔後重新計算INTGR函數。此函數通常用於控制功能，例如PID循環，其中構成了“
I”。當intgr函數出現在真實的操作觸發器，狀態啟動或出現在重置其參數的函數中時（例如閂鎖，切換和保存）時，將重置它。重置Intgr時，積分再次從零開始。此函數可以通過雙精度浮點值進行計算，並且不支持64位整數計算。

largesocketWrite寫入套接字輸出緩衝區中有空間的任務多數，然後等待有更多空間以供更多空間，然後再編寫更多字節，直到源中的所有內容都被排幹。這是一個啟動模塊，因此您應該啟動它並等待完成（從啟動語句返回的對象值無效）。不這樣做可能會導致並非所有數據編寫。如果在源參數中傳遞流，則LargesocketWrite更有效
在寫作之前首先將文本值轉換為Buffstream，並且在寫入完成後丟棄了Buffstream。如果源參數是流，則寫入套接字從流中的當前位置開始。源流在寫入結束時未重新定位。傳遞不是clienterocket或serversocket流的流參數什麼都不做，而largesocketWrite將很快終止。

X模塊; y; 這是給出的 發射（x，self，self）;

snippets: Launch(
\Launchee, { Required. A module pointer or a text expression giving
the module to run. See Comments If this parameter is a module value
that has been returned from a LoadModule or FindVariable statement,
that module will be launched. If this parameter is type text it may
either designate the module by its name, if it is in scope, or it may
give the name of a variable that contains the module value of the
module to launch. }
Parent, { Required. The object value of the module where the Launchee
is to resolve its global variable references. If a valid non-object
value is supplied the Launchee will resolve its global variable
references to the scope defined by the first parameter. If this is
invalid, the module will still run, but global references will be
invalid. }
Caller, { Required. . This specifies the module instance (object)
where the Launchee acts as if it were called from there. If this is
invalid, the module will still run but will not stop without a Slay. A
Return in the case of a subroutine. If it is valid, the module will
stop when the Caller module instance stops, when a Slay is executed
upon it, or (subroutine only) when it calls Return. Often, the object
value of the window to draw within. }
P1, P2, ... { Optional. Are any expressions that will be supplied as
parameters to the launched module. }

snippets: System.Listbox(
X1, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the X coordinate on the
screen of one side of the Listbox, usually the left side. }
Y1, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the Y coordinate on the
screen of either the top or bottom of the Listbox, usually bottom. }
X2, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the X coordinate on the
screen of the side of the Listbox opposite to X1, usually the right
side. }
Y2, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the Y coordinate on the
screen of the top or bottom of the Listbox, whichever is the opposite

Data, { Required. An array of data to display in the Listbox. }
Index, { Required. The index of the highlighted item (i.e. any
variable whose value will be set to the index of the chosen item
(highlight).) If Multi is true, this will be the index of the last
chosen item. }
Picked, { An optional parameter that may be a variable whose value is
set to true (1) when an item is chosen in the Listbox. The setting of
Index by an external source will not trigger Picked. If this
information is not required and the next parameter is used, a value of
invalid or a constant may be substituted. }
Flat, { Obsolete. }
DoubleClick, { An optional parameter that may be a variable whose
value is set to true (1) when an item has been double clicked upon. If

value of invalid or a constant may be substituted. }
MaxLen, { An optional parameter that is any numeric expression giving
the maximum length of the list. If omitted or invalid, the maximum

RightClick, { An optional parameter that may be a variable whose value
is set to true (1) when an item is selected with the right mouse
button. If this information is not required and the next parameter is
used, a value of invalid or a constant may be substituted. }
PostIt, { An optional parameter that is any logical expression. If
true (non-0), a tool tip will be displayed if the text in the list box
has been truncated at its right edge. The default is true. }
FocusID, { An optional parameter that is any numeric expression from 0
to 32767 for the focus number of this graphic. If this value is zero,
the list box will not accept keyboard input, but mouse input will
still be recognized. If it is less than zero, the Listbox will not
accept any input and will appear grayed out. The default value is 1. }
Multi, { An optional parameter that is any logical expression. If true
(non-0), multiple items may be selected in the list. The default is

PickList, { An optional parameter that is a variable whose value is

containing items to be highlighted/selected upon the startup of the

ColWidths, { An optional parameter that indicates the starting widths
for multiple columns. }
ColLabels, { An optional parameter that provides an array of labels
for the columns. }
ColDivider { An optional parameter that indicates the type of divider
to appear between columns. No border appears if the list is a single
column. ColDivider may have one of the following values: The default
is "2". ColDivider Divider Type 0 No column divider shown. 1 Show a
non-moveable column divider. 2 Show a moveable column divider. }

ListCertificates將返回已過期或尚未有效的證書。返回的一系列信息是一系列結構，每個證書有一個結構，符合所提供的標準。該結構具有以下成員：友好名稱。證書的友好名稱。名稱文字。證書的通用名稱。描述文字。證書的描述。鄉村文字。國家代碼（例如CA，GB）。州政府文字。證書上的州/省。局部文字。證書上的地區（例如城鎮）。組織文字。證書已發行的組織。組織nunit文本。證書已發行的組織單位。發行人文字。證書發行人的通用名稱。串行文字。證書序列號。有效從雙double。證書開始日期/時間的VTSCADA時間戳。有效to
double。證書結束日期/時間的VTSCADA時間戳。
Eku陣列。證書上的每個擴展密鑰用法都存儲在其數組元素中。
sha1thumbprint持有證書的計算出的sha1拇指標記的二進制緩衝區。這將與“
Windows證書”對話框的詳細信息選項卡所顯示的指紋匹配。
A二進制緩衝區持有計算的證書的SHA256指紋。替代名稱具有以下成員的結構，從主題替代名稱證書擴展名中提取：DNS數組DNS名稱。
ips的數組。其他由OID定義的其他條目的結構數組。結構具有以下格式：oid數量的對象標識符。值該數量的值。
publickey證書的公鑰。這是在VTSCADA加密密鑰值中保存的，可以用作適當VTSCADA加密語句的輸入參數。
privateKey如果將證書的私鑰存儲在該計算機上，並且當前用戶有權訪問該計算機。這是在VTSCADA加密密鑰值中保存的，可以用作適當VTSCADA加密語句的輸入參數。如果用戶沒有足夠的許可或沒有私鑰，則在此處存儲無效。
snippets: ListCertificates(

authentication. }
Issuer, { Optional text. If valid, specifies the name of a certificate

RequirePrivateKey { Optional Boolean. If TRUE, only returns
certificates for which you hold a private key. Defaults to FALSE. }

snippets: ListVars(
Module, { Required. Any module or object value. This identifies the
module where the variable list begins. }
Name, { Required. Any text value, which specifies a name to match when
listing. Wildcards are allowed. The wildcard "?" will match any
character in a name. The wildcard "*" will match any series of
characters. The backslash character has special meaning, in that it
can be added in front of the characters *, ? or \ to search for these
characters explicitly. In these three cases, the leading backslash
will be ignored. Other characters must match exactly. A leading
backslash in front of any characters other than the three noted will
be included in the search. }
LowClass, { Required. Any numeric expression. This specifies the
lowest class included in the list. Valid range is 0 to 65535. Default
class for variables is 0. See also: Variable Classes. }
HighClass, { Required. Any numeric expression. This specifies the
highest class included in the list. Valid range is 0 to 65535. Default
class for variables is 0. }
Type, { Required. Any numeric expression that specifies the type of
variable to match, as found by adding together values in the following
table: (See: Bitwise Parameters & Operations ) Type Bit No. Variable
Type 0 - Match all 1 0 Normal 2 1 Array 4 2 Parameter 8 3 Module }

comments: Internet客戶端（VIC）只能加載32位DLL，無論VTSCADA服務器是32位還是64位。
必須將對像作為緩衝區返回，以使VTSCADA能夠讀取它。返回值是新DLL（valueType
38）的Windows¢句柄，或者是失敗時，操作系統錯誤代碼的16位最低（valueType
DLL必須在系統程序文件夾（例如\ \ Windows \
32）或可執行搜索路徑上的文件夾（路徑環境變量）上手動安裝在VIC上。
LoadDll是一個穩態語句。如果停止，則所有持有從LoadDll語句返回的DLLHANDLE的副本的值將被無效，並且如果沒有其他載荷DLL運行的其他loaddll，則將卸載DLL。

（LoadDll並不是一個昂貴的操作，但是不經常這樣做是很好的編程。）注意：LoadDll將阻止調用解釋器線程，直到加載DLL已在VIC上完成為止。這意味著直到完成DLL負載完成之前，任何其他人都不會執行。這具有（從程序員的角度來看）的優勢，即返回的DLL句柄立即可以使用。如果參數有問題，如果負載無法加載DLL，則LoadDll將返回無效，如果負載成功，則將其返回。失敗時，返回值將是操作系統錯誤代碼中最小的16位（valueType
<3）。 DLL calls do not need to
have no return value should be
type of zero to indicate that
there is no return value, or
other than zero for the return
type, the DLL call will block
until the VIC has run the DLL
even但是，如果您指定零的返回值類型，則它們會放慢腳步，將遠程DLL調用派發到VIC異步（即，您的解釋器線程都不會阻止您的dll呼叫，因為您只能執行一個the
conterron，呼叫可能需要更長的時間，因為在VIC上保留了DLL調用的順序，並且所有異步的執行都必須在執行同步的情況下要快得多。如果它們要遠程共享DLL，則只能創建一次，因此只能在服務器或客戶端上工作，具體取決於首先啟動的DLL。
snippets: LoadDLL(
FileName, { Required. Any text expression for the file name of the DLL
to load. If the path is not specified, the standard Windows search
pattern for DLLs will be used. Windows applications that load DLL's
without using a fully qualified pathname are vulnerable to DLL
hijacking where an attacker can place a malicious copy of the DLL in
the search path. Take care to specify the path in all cases. }
VICRemoted { (Optional). A parameter that indicates whether the handle
returned by LoadDLL will be remoted to the VIC. If VICRemoted is a
valid, non-zero, positive integer, and the LoadDLL function is being
executed in a module instance that is within a VIC session, then all
DLL calls using the handle that LoadDLL returns will be remoted to the
VIC. Whether the LoadDLL is in a VIC session is determined by the call
tree from the module instance running the LoadDLL call. The root of
the call tree must be an instance of BrowserClient. In practical
terms, this means that you cannot expect session-aware DLL calls to
function if you explicitly launch a module with a caller other than a
module instance within the VIC session tree. Defaults to 0 if not
otherwise specified. }

containing MIBs (possibly in further subdirectories). The returned MIB
dictionary will also include those elements of the base MIBs found in

If Invalid, then the returned MIB dictionary will only include the

SubIDIndexing, { An optional Boolean expression. If TRUE, then items
in the returned MIB dictionary are keyed by numeric portion of the OID
for that element. If FALSE, then the items are keyed by the label for

LoadDescriptions, { An optional Boolean expression. If TRUE, then the

ErrorOut { An optional variable into which any errors found in parsing

error message structures. The message structure will contain two
fields: Error, containing the error text and Next containing the next
error message structure, if any. }

comments: { Description: 將事件記錄到系統事件日誌。 }

事件日誌存儲在Windows上運行的應用程序的重要事件。由於日誌記錄功能的設計為通用，因此您必須確定哪些信息適合日誌。通常，您應僅記錄可能在診斷硬件或軟件問題的信息。事件記錄設施不打算用作跟踪工具。事件記錄消耗系統資源，例如磁盤空間和處理器時間。事件日誌所需的磁盤空間數量取決於您選擇的登錄多少信息。因此，僅記錄基本信息很重要。以下是有關您可能希望登錄的每個嚴重性信息事件的事件類型的一些Microsoft指南，表明很少發生的成功操作。通常，每次啟動事件都可以記錄一個應用程序，通常不認為該應用程序。警告事件表明問題並不立即重大，但可能表明可能導致問題的情況。通常，如果應用程序可以繼續或從事件中恢復而不會丟失功能或數據，則可以將事件分類為警告。錯誤錯誤事件表明用戶應該知道的重大問題。錯誤事件通常導致功能或數據的丟失。當安全訪問嘗試失敗時，審計失敗被認為是審計失敗。失敗的登錄嘗試是故障審核事件。當安全訪問嘗試成功時，審計成功，這是一個成功審核事件。例如，成功的登錄嘗試是成功審核事件。有關NT事件記錄的更多信息，請參閱Microsoft
logntevent的唯一必需參數是與事件登錄的字符串或字符串的嚴重性代碼（嚴重性）（字符串）（字符串），您可以選擇指定：應用程序事件源（默認值為“
EventID（數字，通常從1000左右開始，以免與類別編號衝突。數據和數據（用於將二進制數據存儲在事件中）。數據數組的數據量應為字節的大小。數據是與事件一起存儲的任何二進制數據。
uncServername是可以記錄事件的機器（默認值無效，這導致事件記錄在本地機器上。否則，您可以指定所需的事件已記錄的機器的UNC名稱）。請注意，除非編寫自定義DLL來處理案例，否則指定源或EventID默認值以外的其他值將導致事件日誌顯示不當。但是，這並不能阻止該事件記錄，並且可以在以後添加自定義DLL。

8）。呼叫請求者現在可以讀取並寫入該流以與所謂的一方進行通信。要掛斷電話，請致電閉路（）。如果另一端掛起或呼叫失敗，則DataPort將變得無效。如果呼叫設置失敗，則該調用將根據配置的重試設置進行重試。如果呼叫被重述，則在呼叫排隊時，DataPort將再次成為數組指針。在呼叫放棄之前，DataPort不會無效。如果發起者要求在完成之前取消呼叫，則應使用cancelCall（）方法。如果發起人更改數據管值，則效果是未定義的。

comments: 通過返回持有編碼的二進制IP地址和掩碼的文本，製作一個可以傳遞到CheckipMask和ipMaskTotext的IP掩碼集。適用於IPv4和IPv6。

僅供高級使用。作為一般過程，請使用MakeipMask生成掩模，然後可以將其傳遞到CheckipMask和ipMaskTotext中。用於生成一個可以將其饋送到CheckipMask中的值，以驗證IP地址是否位於該功能構建的掩碼設置的子網範圍內。在典型的用法中，OldMaskSet最初將是無效的，並且由於第一個呼叫而創建了一個新的掩碼。每次成功進行呼叫時，蒙版的尺寸都會增長（32個字節），為16個字節的二進制IP地址16個字節16個字節的匹配掩碼位，以二進制緩衝區保存。
IPv4地址/蒙版將擴展到IPv4映射的IPv6地址中，以使其大小相同。沒有進行訂購或結合以將面具減少到所需的最小設置。無效的iPaddress參數簡單地導致第一個參數（掩碼集）未改變。一個不好的人沒有效果。這也意味著該語句可用於通過傳遞oldmaskset的無效並檢查返回值有效，以檢查IP地址或CIDR符號的句法有效性。
snippets: MakeIPMask(

or Invalid when starting afresh. }

the Mask parameter will be used if valid, OR an IP subnet address.
IPv4 and IPv6 both have their subnet representations and either is
acceptable here, as are IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses. }
Mask { Optional text. An optional IP mask, used as an alternative way
of specifying a subnet range, in conjunction with a non-CIDR IPv4 or
IPv6 second parameter. }

comments: { Description: 給定短語密鑰和參數的返回\
MakeParmphrase返回一個參數化短語信息的結構，用於標記參數。必須使用將短語作為參數（例如，描述或單位）作為優化參數表達式創建不優化的tag參數表達式時，\
parmphrase（）是構建參數化短語結構的首選方法，而應使用。請參閱標籤參數中的短語，不用於頁面上繪製的文本。而是使用\
makeParmphrase（...））作為適用。作為專門的用例，MakeParmphrase還支持對其任何參數使用翻譯詞典。僅在極少數情況下使用以下信息，即靜態翻譯的標準.CSV文件不合適。翻譯詞典應採用以下形式，該表格代替詞組：system.makentictionary（“
hola”）;然後，MakeParmphrase將返回與用戶當前語言相對應的翻譯。如果字典不包含用戶當前語言的翻譯，而是對默認語言的翻譯，則將返回默認語言。如果也不存在，那麼它將返回“丟失翻譯”（語言依賴）。請注意，當字典中給定鍵的內容更改時，該短語可能不會動態更新。翻譯詞典不應在大多數應用中使用。

comments: { Description: 創建一個新的自簽名證書。 }
該語句創建一個自簽名的證書。自簽名的證書是沒有信任鏈的，因此要被信任的證書需要安裝在受信任的根存儲中，或者（更好）使用其使用它的軟件可以明確允許信任它。自簽名證書中寫入的發行人名稱與主題參數中的通用名稱字段相同。主題參數對許多其他證書生成軟件包具有熟悉的表格。它是以下序列：<distinifier>
= <value>被半顏色隔開，其中標識符是RFC
lpoint”，組織為“三面體”，組織單位為“工程”。鑰匙要素和哈希爾古人是Microsoft
SHA256”是有效的哈希值。自證書創建時代以來的幾天內，有效性Period表示。按鍵長度指定鍵的長度。對於RSA，這應該至少為2048位。允許較大的尺寸，但目前尚未使用。鍵盤是一組位值，可為私有
/公共密鑰對指定預期用法。這些定義為：常數#keyusagesignature
5280描述了這些位及其目的。例如，通常將0xF0的組合用於客戶身份驗證目的。
EKU是一個文本值或文本值數組，該值定義了鍵的擴展密鑰用法（有時稱為增強的密鑰用法）。文本值是對象標識符（OID）。常用的內容包括：服務器身份驗證1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.1客戶端身份驗證1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.2代碼簽名1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.3
SAN是文本值或一系列文本值，這些文本值定義了主題替代名稱，以寫入證書中。這些以：<didentifier>
URL”之一。將來可能會添加對其他類型的支持。值是代表值的字符串。
snippets: MakeSelfSignedCertificate(
MachineStore, { Required Boolean. If TRUE (non-zero) attempts to find
the certificate in a store in the Local Computer certificate hive. If

for the certificate. }
Subject, { Required text. The subject that will be written into the
certificate. }
KeyAlgorithm, { Optional text. The name of the algorithm used with the
public / private key pair and to sign the certificate. }
HashAlgorithm, { Optional text. The name of the algorithm used to hash
the certificate prior to signing. }
ValidityPeriod, { Optional numeric. The number of days for which the
new certificate will be valid. }
KeyStrength, { Optional numeric. The key strength in bits. }
KeyUsage, { Optional numeric. The permitted usages for the private /
public key pair. }
EKU, { Optional text or array of text values. The Extended Key Usages
permitted for the private / public key pair. }
SAN { Optional text or array of text values. A set of Subject
Alternative Names to be written into the certificate. }

UserInput, { Optional Boolean. Set FALSE to disable user input.

snippets: MatchKeys(
Enable, { Required. Any numeric expression that enables the function.
Testing of keyboard input is enabled when this parameter is true (i.e.
not 0). If it is 0 (false), then the function's value is false. In
addition, the Enable parameter controls the type of comparison done.
If the Enable is 1, a case-sensitive match is made. If the Enable is
2, then the match is not case-sensitive. (Any non-zero value other
than 2 will cause a case-sensitive match. The use of 1 and 2 is
recommended for clarity.) }
Keys { Required. A text expression giving the key sequence to watch
for. The case of individual letters may be significant, depending on
the Enable parameter. To generate extended keys that are not already
available as constants defined in the system layer, use MakeBuff to
turn the character code(s) into a text expression. For example: PageUp
= Concat(MakeBuff(1, 253), MakeBuff(1, 0x49)); F2 =
Concat(MakeBuff(1,253), MakeBuff(1,60)); F3 = Concat(MakeBuff(1,253),
MakeBuff(1,61)); CtrlZKey = MakeBuff(1, 26); }

comments: 將一組更改（差異操作的輸出）應用於緩衝區。 }
首先，源緩衝區必須與用於創建DIFF緩衝區的原點緩衝區相同。此操作不會失敗，但是如果輸入緩衝區損壞或使用錯誤的原始緩衝區，則會產生意外的結果。此功能是同步的，並返回操作的結果。
Diffuff中的操作格式如下：前四個字節的低31位保持數據部分的長度，以字節測量。前四個字節中的最高位將是一個0，以指示這是刪除操作或1表示這是一個添加操作。接下來的四個字節將偏移量保持在應進行操作的源緩衝區中。最終的“長度”字節（在第一個31位中定義長度）保存要添加的數據，以便在這是一個添加操作的情況下。
Difbuff”可能是DIFF函數的結果。合併假設difbuff中的差異是正確的，因此沒有檢查SourceBuff之外的偏移等。呼叫者的責任是正確的。合併依賴於在特定位置訂購為“添加”的“修改”操作，然後在同一位置進行“刪除”。這是DIFF函數生成的排序。逆轉訂單將導致不良結果。
snippets: Merge(
SourceBuff, { Required. The buffer or stream to be modified. }
DiffBuff { Required. The buffer or stream containing formatted
instructions for how to modify the source buffer. }

comments: 嘗試將兩個不同的差異緩衝區應用於單個原點緩衝區。 }

類似於組合，但沒有自動衝突解決或更改優先級。兩個差異緩衝區都必須從相同的來源開始，並且該來源必須是提供的。假定差異緩衝區代表對同一原點的不同變化。如果在不干擾或相互衝突的情況下無法乾淨地應用更改，則此功能將失敗。衝突定義為以下任何一個：在同一位置發生的兩個添加物並添加不同的數據。一個刪除和一個增加的添加在刪除範圍內。描述故障性質的信息將提供到第四和第五參數。第六個參數帶有一個組合的差異緩衝區，其中包含所有沒有衝突的更改。應用於檢測衝突的規則：1。將操作刪除和重疊刪除都合併以創建複合刪除。如果復合刪除隨後的添加衝突，則復合刪除的所有組成刪除也被標記為衝突。
2。兩者都是加法操作。衝突只能發生在偏移時。如果在不同的偏移處發生添加，則不會發生衝突。如果加法在相同的偏移量中使用相同的數據發生，則沒有衝突。如果添加出現在相同的偏移量，但添加不同的數據，則會發生衝突。
3。一個操作添加和另一個刪除。如果添加發生在刪除操作範圍內，則會發生衝突。如果添加發生在刪除操作範圍之外，則沒有衝突。當確定兩個記錄基於先前的規則發生衝突時，我們需要仔細閱讀所有先前保存的記錄，標記為#pending，以將其轉移到衝突的詞典上。如果兩個差異之間存在衝突，則子例程將返回衝突信息，而如果沒有，則兩個差異將同時應用於源緩衝區。此操作是同步的，結果緩衝區由呼叫返回。

snippets: ModemDial(
Modem, { Required. Either a numeric expression giving the modem number
between 1 and the number of modems in the system (the return from
ModemCount), or a modem stream opened via the ModemStream function. }
PhoneNumber, { Required. Any text expression specifying the phone
number to dial. It can contain any of the special dialing characters
that Windows Ã allows. If this parameter is invalid a pass-through
connection will be obtained. }
ReceiveLen, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the size of the
receive buffer for the serial stream in bytes. ReceiveLen must be in
the range 2 to 32 766. If more bytes are received than can fit in the
receive buffer before the application removes them, the additional
data will be lost. }
TransmitLen, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the size of the
transmit buffer for the serial stream in bytes. TransmitLen must be in
the range 2 to 32 766. The buffer must be large enough to hold the
maximum number of bytes pending transmission at any instance. }
MinBaud, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the minimum baud
rate which will be acceptable on the modem connection. The baud rate
at which the connection is made may actually be higher than this value
but may not exceed MaxBaud. The baud rate must be in the range 0 to
115,200, and must divide evenly into 115,200 with no more than 2.5%
error. The value of 0 has special significance. This corresponds to
the maximum baud rate available for the particular device. }
MaxBaud, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the maximum baud
rate which will be acceptable on the modem connection. The baud rate
at which the connection is made may actually be lower than this value
but may not be less than MinBaud. The baud rate must be in the range 0
to 115,200, and must divide evenly into 115,200 with no more than 2.5%
error. The value of 0 has special significance. This corresponds to
the maximum baud rate available for the particular device. }
DataBits, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the number of data
bits per character. DataBits must be 5, 6, 7, or 8. }
StopBits, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the number of stop
bits per character. StopBits must be 1 or 2. }
Parity { Required. Any numeric expression giving the parity checking
to use: Parity Checking Type 0 No parity 1 dd parity 2 Even parity 3
Stick (space parity) 4 1 Stick (mark parity) }

comments: 使您能夠確定在調製解調器上打開串行流的媒體模式，並在必要時進行更改（例如，如果您需要能夠處理傳入的語音模式和數據模式調用的能力）。

在處理多模式調用時，MediaMode很重要。可以在撥打呼叫（調製器）或準備調製解調器以接聽傳入呼叫（調製解式）時指定它，並且是在將呼叫轉換為另一個服務（調製Emtransfer）之前的考慮因素。如果設置了一個以上的mediaMode位，則呼叫類型是不確定的，也應設置未知（2）。不可能將媒體模式更改為創建調製解調器時指定的模式以外的模式。如果無法實現所需的媒體更改，則該函數將返回無效。如果在調製解調器上沒有主動調用，則該函數還將返回無效。如果指定了交互式語音（4）或自動語音（8），則調製解調器將在語音模式下初始化。在外向的呼叫上，這會導致進度指示不可靠
撥號完成後將其報告為連接。這是模擬語音調製解調器的限制。對媒體模式的更改可能不會立即發生。例如，將調用從語音模式更改為數據模式會啟動調製解調器訓練順序，該順序可能需要幾秒鐘才能完成。現代函數的返回值表示當前狀態，因此可以用於確定更改何時完成。

Valid values are bit significant, and more than one may be specified.
MediaMode Meaning Comments 2 Unknown Is set whenever more than one of

the modem microphone/speaker. 8 Automated Voice For simulated speech
and wave files. Allows DTMF digit detection. 16 Datamodem For data

snippets: ModemStream(
Modem, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the modem number
between 1 and the number of modems in the system (the return from
ModemCount). }
RingCount, { An optional parameter that is any numeric expression
designating the number of rings after which the modem should be
answered. If this parameter is 0 the modem will not answer the call.
The default is 1. }
ReceiveLen, { An optional parameter that is any numeric expression
giving the size of the receive buffer for the serial stream in bytes.
ReceiveLen must be in the range 2 to 32 766. The default length is
1024. If more bytes are received than can fit in the receive buffer
before the application removes them, the additional data will be lost.
TransmitLen, { An optional parameter that is any numeric expression
giving the size of the transmit buffer for the serial stream in bytes.
TransmitLen must be in the range 2 to 32 766. The default length is
1024. The buffer must be large enough to hold the maximum number of
bytes pending transmission at any instance. }
MediaMode { An optional numeric expression, specifying the desired
media mode for the call. See ModemMedia for a description of valid
values and their meanings. }

comments: { Description: 用於更改帳戶定義的任何元素。
要使用此API，呼叫代碼必須在具有管理器特權的安全性會話中運行。修改帳戶是一種異步操作。如果未嘗試使用異步操作，則由於檢測到錯誤，返回值將無效。如果嘗試使用異步操作，則返回值將是對象值。當異步操作完成時，對象值將變得無效。當時（或當方法返回無效時），可以檢查ptrreturnCode解決的值以確定操作的狀態。

ptrreturnCode解決的值的內容不確定，直到該方法返回無效為止。可以通過在NewAccountdata中提供單個帳戶結構來修改單個帳戶。可以通過在NewAccountdata中提供單個維數陣列或AccountData結構字典來修改多個帳戶。如果在newAccountdata中提供了單個結構，則在PtrreturnCode解決的值中返回的結果代碼將是標量值。如果提供了結構或結構字典的數組，則將在PtrreturnCode地址的值中返回與NewAccountData相同大小的單個維數陣列，每個元素都包含相應的NewAccountdata元素的結果代碼。修改帳戶需要一個工作副本寫鎖。如果通過調用代碼保留這樣的鎖，則必須將Havelock參數設置為true。否則省略此參數或將其設置為false。如果調用代碼在工作副本上包含讀取鎖，則必須在ModifyAccount完成其操作之前釋放此鎖。提供的帳戶結構必須將帳戶成員設置為現有帳戶ID。結構的任何其他成員都可能無效，在這種情況下，不會對帳戶記錄的該成員進行任何更改。只有有效的成員引起修改。如果密碼正在更改，則新密碼必須符合應用程序密碼的設置。返回後，密碼成員不會刪除。強烈建議呼叫代碼小心，以確保在完成此操作後儘快將未加密的密碼銷毀。
snippets: \SecurityManager\ModifyAccount(
NewAccountData, { Required. An AccountData structure, a single
dimension array of AccountData structures or a dictionary of
AccountData structures containing the data to modify in each account.
PtrReturnCode, { Optional. A pointer to a value that will contain one
of the defined result codes at the conclusion of the operation. }
HaveLock { Optional. A Boolean value that indicates whether the
working copy lock is held by the calling code. Default FALSE. }

comments: 讀取現有的圖像句柄並產生帶有修改的新圖像。原始圖像沒有更改。失敗後返回無效。
由於圖像渲染優化的方式，某些圖像修改的性能影響比通常假設的性能更大。例如，縮放和裁剪的變化很慢
snippets: ModifyBitmap(
Handle, { Required. The image handle to copy and modify. }
Reflect, { An optional logical value that can be set to 1 to reflect
the image about the vertical axis. The default is no reflection (0). }
Hue, { An optional numeric expression for the hue rotation to apply to
all of the colors in the image. Range -180 to 180. The default is no
hue rotation, (0). }
Saturation, { An optional numeric expression that is a multiplier to
the intensity of each primary color component of every color in the
image. Range: 0 to 255. Defaults to 1 if missing or invalid. }
Lightness, { An optional numeric expression that is a multiplier to
the brightness of the image. Range 0+. Defaults to 1 if missing or
invalid. }
Transparency, { An optional numeric expression for a multiplier to the
transparency (alpha value) of every color in the image. Range 0
(transparent) to 1 (opaque). Defaults to 1 if missing or invalid. }
Contrast, { Optional numeric expression to enhance the differences
between the colors in the image. Range 0+. Defaults to 1 if missing or
invalid. }
ColorizeHue, { Optional numeric expression for the hue value of a
color to be mixed with every color in the image. Range -180 to 180.
Defaults to 0 if missing or invalid. }
ColorizeSaturation, { Optional numeric expression for the intensity of
the added color. Zero means that no color is added. Range 0-1.
Defaults to 0 if missing or invalid. }
AntiAlias, { Bit 0 controls whether anti-aliasing will be done when
the image is stretched. Defaults to 1 (TRUE) if missing or invalid. By
default, feathering will be applied to an anti-aliased image when it
is stretched. Set bit 1 to 1 (TRUE) to suppress feathering. }
ScalarColor, { Optional color value in the form aRGB A colour value,
defined as four, two-digit hexadecimal values. Alpha - Red - Green -
Blue. An Alpha value of FFis assumed if only the RGB values are
provided. , used to apply a specific color to a gray-scale image. }
Rotation { Optional floating point value, specifying the clockwise
rotation in degrees to be applied when the image is drawn. }

comments: 提供了一種寫入配置文件的安全方法。 }
如果將ModifyConfiguration的呼叫者訂閱到工作副本更改（通過WCSUBSCRIBE），則在調用此功能後，它將無法獲得其自己更改的訂閱回調。在第二個參數中命名的回調模塊必須是啟動的模塊或返回無效的子例程。允許回調模塊編寫配置文件，並可以保證，對於模塊的壽命，沒有其他配置代碼可以修改該文件。回調模塊必須具有以下參數
snippets: \ModifyConfiguration(
pSuccess, { A required pointer to a value, which will be set to 1 on
successful completion or 0 on failure. }
CallBackModuleName, { A required text value, containing the name of
the callback module to be launched into the caller. }
ExtraInfo, { An optional parameter which may be any value. If present,
it will be passed through to the callback module. }
Deploy { Optional Boolean. Has no effect while the application is
running in automatic-deploy mode. If auto-deploy is off, then when
this parameter is TRUE (or Invalid) the modified files will be
deployed immediately after the changes occur. Defaults to TRUE. Deploy
must be present and set to FALSE to prevent ModifyConfiguration from
acting as if auto-deploy is always on. }

comments: 可用於創建，修改或刪除運行標籤。為創建持久標籤的情況而替換了StartTag。
有關更多詳細信息，請參見評論。 }
一些讀者可能已經使用了非啟動啟動呼叫來創建父/子標籤結構。
現在，StartTag已經過時了，應該使用標籤瀏覽器而不是代碼創建這些結構。該模塊將一個工作模塊啟動到代碼中，以使該模塊的呼叫者被殺死不會中斷操作。
該函數的返回值是對該工人模塊的引用。通過觀察這將變得無效，您可以發現該模塊何時完成。
ModifyTags通過修改root標籤聲明或添加root標籤數據庫中未定義的子標籤的覆蓋詞來起作用。
它不會修改標籤類型定義。
{thechange};對於標籤刪除，{thechange}只是無效。對於創建或更新，{thechange}是參數值的字典，由參數名稱鍵入。創建新標籤時，newtags字典必須具有指定標籤類型的條目。
如果有一個已經運行的給定名稱的標籤，它將被刪除，新標籤將使用新的唯一ID創建，即使NewTags中指定的類型與當前運行的標籤類型相同。
因此，這是一種停止標籤並創建具有相同友好名稱的標籤的方法，但在單個操作中都是不同的唯一ID和可能是不同類型的標籤。更新標籤時，標籤參數將發生在標籤參數字典中的標籤參數將取決於合併參數的值。
如果是true（默認值），則這些參數仍被操作保持不變。
如果為false，則這些參數還原為默認值，其中root標籤的默認值是標籤類型中指定的默認值，而子標籤的默認值是由其父級類型的子類標籤定義記錄指定的值（即，它將具有沒有任何根部覆蓋的值）。合併參數對標籤添加或刪除沒有影響。要將參數設置為表達式，您可以將元數據設置為單個參數值。例如：tagparms
{優化的表達式}如果Havelock為True，那麼當該模塊完成時，標記參數的內存緩存將被更新，並且這些更改將待定寫入標籤文件並將其合併到運行的標籤中。
請注意，不能保證已經執行了這些動作。
這將在下一個提交期間發生。如果Havelock是錯誤的，則可以確保所有受這些更改影響的運行標籤都將被更新或停止（以適用的為準）。
同樣，儘管所有的根標籤和所有子標籤（父母正在運行，並且會導致存在的更改）都將運行，但不能保證他們將運行其刷新模塊。
也不能保證剛剛開始的標籤孩子將運行，更不用說刷新了。當使用Merge
False參數調用時，可以將TAG參數恢復為默認值，或使用API
如果在不使用此API的情況下使用Merge =
false調用ModifyTags，則在保留其他API的同時無法刪除某些配置的參數。要更改某些已配置的參數，稱為getTagConfiguredParameters，請修改參數字典（add/modify/remover），然後將修改後的詞典傳遞到調用modifyTags中。
snippets: \ModifyTags(
pSuccess, { An optional pointer to a value, which will be set to 1 on
successful completion or 0 on failure. }
TagParameters, { Dictionary of tag parameters, each of which is also a
dictionary. See examples. }
NewTags, { Optional. Dictionary of tag additions. Key is tag friendly
name and value is tag type. If you have a NewTags entry for a tag that
already exists, then the action will be a deletion and an add of that
tag. The added tag will not have the same UniqueID as the original
tag, and therefore page references and history for the old tag will
not be associated with the new tag, }
UserID, { Optional. User making change }
Comment, { Optional. Comment to store with changes }
Merge, { Optional. On update, true to retain parameters not specified
in parameter dictionary, false to revert all other parameters to their
defaults. Defaults to TRUE }
HaveLock, { Optional. If false, this module gets the working copy lock
and commits changes and update tags when finished. If true, caller
must have WC lock ModifyTags will not get WC lock, commit changes, or
update running tags. Defaults to FALSE }
pErrors { Optional output: dictionary of errors, keyed by name of tag
with error, containing #MODTAGS_* error code. Defined in Code.
Constants used as error codes, returned in the pErrors dictionary
parameter of ModifyTags: Constant Value Description #MODTAGS_BADNAME 1
Name of added tag is not allowed. Refer to tag naming rules.
#MODTAGS_BADTYPE 2 Provided type is not an existing type
#MODTAGS_MISSINGTAG 3 Attempting to modify a non-existent tag.
#MODTAGS_MISSINGPARENT 4 Attempting to add a child to a non-existing
parent. Constants used as global error codes returned in root value of
ModifyTags's pErrors dictionary parameter: Constant Value Description
#MODTAGS_NOERROR 0 No error. #MODTAGS_TAGERROR 1 One of the errors
listed in the preceding table. #MODTAGS_NOTEDITABLE 2 Application
cannot be edited at this time. (Most likely, a restart is required.) }

Studio中以及頁面菜單頁面顯示實時預覽時，您的代碼將運行，在這些情況下可能會產生不良結果。在頁面中，此功能的觸發因素應該是用戶操作，而不是自動運行的任何操作。

{ 交易是作為單個操作完成的工作單位。該操作成功或整體失敗。

ODBCBeginTrans表示將在指定的ODBC數據庫上啟動交易。請注意，每個ODBC數據庫驅動程序可能具有不同級別的交易支持（或根本沒有），並且應諮詢該驅動程序的文檔以確定交易支持級別。該交易應用ODBCCOMMIT或ODBCROLLBACK終止。如果由於語句而導致任何錯誤（無論次要）發生，並且連接到數據庫的TODBCCONNECT或ODBCCONNECT將其斷開連接參數設置為true，則DB的值將無效（即，與數據庫的連接將刪除）。

function. If valid, both ErrorMsg and SQLState will be valid. }

by Microsoft and by the vendor of each ODBC driver. }
ErrorCode { An unsuccessful operation always returns a non-zero value,
which is a numeric error code specific to the DBMS vendor's ODBC
driver or Microsoft's ODBC Driver Manager. A successful operation will
always return a 0. ErrorMsg and SQLState may or may not be set valid
in the event of a successful connection. If set valid, they should be
examined for relevant status information. }

comments: 形成與符合ODBC數據庫的連接，並返回與該數據庫關聯的ODBC值。
如果將用戶名和密碼參數指定為無效，則將DSNAME參數視為ODBC連接的字面連接字符串。例如，在語句odbcconnect（“
=”，無效，無效）中，第一個參數用於設置連接的屬性，這使得此語句等同於odbcconnect（“

mydata”，“，”，“”，“”）。對於可選參數，如果遵循有效參數，則可以將任何不需要的參數設置為0，或者如果沒有有效的參數遵循它，則可以簡單地省略。成功完成ODBC和ODBCCONNECT函數後，本機錯誤代碼將設置為0，從而允許用戶判斷沒有結果集的命令是否已完成。用戶不應假設由於返回0，因此該命令已成功執行。即使發生錯誤，一些驅動程序（例如Excel）也會在本機錯誤代碼中返回0。所有ODBC操作都可能導致一個或多個狀態或錯誤條件。
VTSCADA記錄了整個狀態/誤差條件集，並在內部緩衝它們。使用ODBCSTATUS函數檢索整個集合。僅發生的第一個條件，或者，如果出現錯誤和諮詢條件，則在errormsg和sqlstate值中返回了第一個錯誤條件。從VTS
2.x）。這具有副作用，即對於某些SQLSTATE值，將返回不同的SQLSTATE返回值。如果您的書面代碼取決於SQLSTATE返回的值，則可能需要更改預期的值。請參閱http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms712451%28vs.85%29.aspx，以獲取有關值更改的參考。
64位VTSCADA能夠連接到64位或32位ODBC數據源。
ODBCCONNECT將首先嘗試通過64位ODBC驅動程序連接到數據庫。如果出於任何原因失敗，它將通過32位ODBC驅動程序嘗試連接。這意味著，任何在32位VTSCADA下工作的ODBC代碼都不需要修改以與64位VTSCADA一起使用，但是64位VTSCADA具有能夠使用64位ODBC驅動程序的額外能力。
snippets: ODBCConnect(
DSName, { Required. Any text expression for the ODBC data source name,
as configured in the ODBC setup menu under Microsoft Windowsâ¢. }
UserName, { Required. Any text expression for the ODBC login user
name. }
Password, { Required. Any text expression for the ODBC login password.
ErrorMsg, { A descriptive error or status message, returned by the
function. If valid, both ErrorMsg and SQLState will be valid. }
SQLState, { A 5-character SQL State code. SQL State codes are defined
by Microsoft and by the vendor of each ODBC driver. }
ErrorCode, { An unsuccessful operation always returns a non-zero
value, which is a numeric error code specific to the DBMS vendor's
ODBC driver or Microsoft's ODBC Driver Manager. A successful operation
will always return a 0. ErrorMsg and SQLState may or may not be set
valid in the event of a successful connection. If set valid, they
should be examined for relevant status information. }
Disconnect, { An optional parameter that is any logical expression
that determines how errors are to be handled. If true (non-0), the
connection to the database will be disconnected should any error (no
matter how minor) occur. If false (0) an error will not cause a
disconnect to occur. The default value is false. }
LoginTimeout, { Optional. An SQLUINTEGER (unsigned long) value
corresponding to the number of seconds to wait for a login request to
complete before returning to the application. The default is
driver-dependent. If the value is 0, then the timeout is disabled and
a connection attempt will wait indefinitely. If the specified timeout
exceeds the maximum login timeout in the data source, then the driver
substitutes that value and returns SQLSTATE 01S02 (Option value
changed). }
ConnectTimeout { Optional. An SQLUINTEGER value corresponding to the
number of seconds to wait for any request on the connection to
complete before returning to the application. The driver should return
SQLSTATE HYT00 (Timeout expired) any time that it is possible to time
out in a situation not associated with query execution or login. If
the value is equal to 0 (the default) then there is no timeout. }

comments: 執行立即部署單個標籤更改，而不會打擾本地分支上已經存在的任何其他標籤更改。標籤必須已經存在。
如果您的應用程序設置為自動數據，則OPCHANGE和MODIFYTAGS可以完成相同的結果。如果未設置自動部署，則兩個函數的結果存在差異。
ModifyTags在本地進行標籤更改，而OpChange將立即部署該標籤更改。在ModifyTags的更改後運行部署操作，將在部署整個標籤文件（以及所有隨附的標籤及其參數）中。
OpChange只能將一個更改部署到文件中的一個標籤中，隨著本地更改，該文件中的其他修改標籤。
Opchanges用於在系統操作期間預期執行的任何標籤更改，而不是在配置過程中進行的更改。該示例是操作員通過使用上下文菜單而不是打開“配置”對話框更改標籤的可疑狀態。當使用Merge
False參數調用時，可以將TAG參數恢復為默認值，或使用API
如果在不使用此API的情況下使用Merge =
false調用OpChange，則在保留其他參數的同時無法刪除某些配置的參數。要更改一些已配置的參數，稱為getTagConfiguredParameters，請修改參數字典（add/modify/remover），然後將修改後的字典傳遞到呼叫opchange。

Merge { Optional Boolean. Defaults to TRUE. Controls whether the
parameters are to be merged with the existing tag's parameters. If
false, the parameters replace the tag's parameters and are expected to
contain user and timestamp metadata. }

of the lower left corner of the number or text on the screen. }

of the lower left corner of the number or text on the screen. }
Type { Required. Any numeric expression giving the type of the data to
display. The valid values for this parameter are: Type Data Type 1

comments: 將數據數組或一組參數序列到對象參數中 }
pack（）是遞歸的。如果這些值包含數組，則將它們包裝在填充物中，依此類推。

StreamVar必須是一個指向變量的指針，而不僅僅是保存流的變量的名稱。這是因為包裝功能將在某些情況下創建一個新的流並將包裝數據存儲在其中。如果流varptr地址的變量包含一個流，則數據將包裝到該流中。如果流varptr地址包含無效的變量，Pack將創建一個新的緩衝流，將數據包裝到其中，然後將新流存儲在流varptr指向的變量中。如果提供緩衝流或包裝創建緩衝流，則如果輸出流超過2MB，它將被臨時文件流替換。這提供了性能和內存使用之間的平衡。如果提供了流，則填料從當前的流位置開始。包裝後，流電流位置將留在包裝數據的末尾。僅包裝數字，文本或流類型的變量。這些類型的陣列（包括3個維度）也將被包裝。任何非法值都被包裝為無效。此外，包裝函數的設計方式是可以處理未分配值的多維陣列。解開流中心後，分配了數組元素，但分配了無效。通常以形式稱為：pack（self（），1，nparm（self（self（））和流）;這是因為NPARM（self（））等於最高的索引。
snippets: Pack(
Data, { Required. An object value, an array, or a structure. Contains
the data or the object value of the module whose parameters are to be
packed. For example, if you have 5 numeric values to pack, you would
allocate a 1-dimensional array, 5 elements in length. You would then
assign the 5 numerics to this array's elements, and pass the array to
this parameter. You would specify that you wish to pack from subscript
1 to 5. Refer to the example section for more information. }
Start, { Required. The starting array index (zero-based), or parameter
number (one-based) of the data to pack. }
End, { Required. For arrays this is the last array index. For
parameters, it is the parameter number of the data to pack. If packing
a structure rather than an array, this must be the number of elements
rather than the final index. }
StreamVarPtr, { Required. A pointer to a variable holding the stream
into which the data will be packed. The variable can also hold Invalid
- see Comments section for more details. }
KeyDictionary { Optional. A dictionary that maps structure names to a
number that will represent the structure in the packed stream. Within
the dictionary, the key is the structure name and the value is the
assigned number. There is no requirement for the Pack KeyDictionary
parameter and the Unpack MirrorKey parameter to have the same number
of elements. All that is required is that the Unpack MirrorKey
dictionary has all of the structures that are in that particular
packed stream. If the KeyDictionary doesnât have the structure that
was packed, the returned data is a simple array rather than a
structure. IfKeyDictionary is not used at all, structures packed using
Pack() will also include additional data to allow UnPack to generate
an equivalent structure. So use the KeyDictionary mechanism if you
need to avoid the associated code bloat. }

comments: 將RPC調用和一組參數包裝到流中。僅子例程。 }
{ 該子例程是RPC Manager庫的成員，因此必須由\
the，如“格式”部分所示。如果您正在開發的應用程序是腳本應用程序，則子例程呼叫必須由System
\置於腳本應用程序，並且必須在Argyot.src中聲明系統變量。此方法的返回值是一個buffstream，其中包含流參數中指定的原始內容，並附加了新的RPC。這可以用來構建作為一個原子單元傳輸的RPC流。
snippets: \RPCManager\PackRPC(
Stream, { Required. The initial packed RPC stream. The RPC specified
in this call will be appended onto the end of this stream. If Invalid,
a new BuffStream will be created to hold the RPC. }
ModuleName, { Required. The textual name of the RPC subroutine to be
executed. Must be valid. }
ModuleContext, { Required. The context in which the "ModuleName" will
be executed. The "base" context for a VTScada layer-based application
is "Code". For a non-VTScada (pure script) application, the base
context is "\System". Must be valid. }
Parameters { Required. A set of up to 32 parameters to the RPC
subroutine. Can be any mixture of the legal types. Supplying a
parameter of an illegal type will cause it to be replaced with Invalid
when the RPC subroutine is invoked. }

該模塊是VTSCADA對話框庫的成員，因此必須從吉他上的內部調用並以\

P”工具僅用於配置文件夾和繪圖面板模塊，因此符合系統安全約束。此參數工具期望其調用模塊的第一個參數包含一個標籤參數數組。然後，它將將Parmnum指示的元素設置為Droplist所選行中顯示的文本字符串。未打開的滴定列表的高度是恆定的，其呼叫變換的水平邊界定義了其寬度，並且其調用變換的垂直邊界定義了其打開的高度，其中包括斜角的附加高度，但可能包括標題或可能不包括標題，取決於所使用的一致性。請注意，如果整個列表可以在呼叫變換的垂直邊界所指示的較小的區域中顯示，則掉落的列表高度將降低。列表的下降高度始終將其最小高度為1線（在場下方）。通常的高度：45像素。
snippets: \DialogLibrary.PAlmPriority(
ParmNum, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the parameter
number (from 0) in the caller to alter. }
Title, { Required. Any text expression to be used as a title for the
droplist. }
AlignTitle, { Optional. Any logical expression. Indicates the title
alignment such that if it is TRUE (non-zero), the title is included in
the calculation for vertical alignment. If FALSE (0), it is added to
the droplist after it, and its bevel (if one exists) has been
vertically aligned. The default is TRUE. }
FocusID, { Boolean. If this value is FALSE (0), the field will display
its current setting, but cannot be opened (i.e. its value cannot be
changed), and will appear disabled (grayed-out). }
Trigger, { Optional. Any logical expression. A variable whose value is
set to true (1) when the ParmNum parameter's value has been set by the
droplist. The setting of the parameter will not cause Trigger to be
set. If this information is not required, a constant may be used. }
Init, { Optional. Any expression for the initial value displayed in
the field. The default value is Data[Index]. If Index is invalid, then
the droplist will initially appear blank. }
DrawBevel, { Optional. Any logical expression. If TRUE (non-0), a
bevel is drawn around the droplist. If FALSE (0), no bevel is drawn.
The default value is TRUE. }
VertAlign { Optional. Any numeric expression that sets the vertical
alignment of the unopened droplist according to one of the following:
Value Vertical Alignment 0 Top 1 Center 2 Bottom Whether the title is
included when the vertical alignment is calculated is determined by
the value of AlignTitle. The default value is 0. }

comments: { Description: 返回最近的非兒童窗口的對象值。
此功能將從給定的對象值開始，並找到不是子窗口的第一個窗口。如果沒有發現窗口，則返回值將無效。對於非兒童窗口中的模塊（即一個沒有位9集的一個），rootwindow和parentwindow將返回相同的值。對於子窗口，Rootwindow將返回子窗口中的根模塊，而ParentWindow將返回子窗口最接近的非孩子呼叫窗口中的根模塊。為了測試在“編輯模式”（即在Idea
Studio中）時顯示自定義小部件的，您可以測試ParentWindow（）\編輯是對還是錯。

snippets: PatternMatch(
String, { Required. The string you wish to compare to Pattern. }
Pattern, { Required. The reference pattern to which you wish String to
be compared. Wildcards are allowed. The wildcard "?" will match any
character in a name. The wildcard "*" will match any series of
characters. The backslash character has special meaning, in that it
can be added in front of the characters *, ? or \ to search for these
characters explicitly. In these three cases, the leading backslash
will be ignored. Other characters must match exactly. A leading
backslash in front of any characters other than the three noted will
be included in the search. }
CaseInsensitive { An optional Boolean parameter that indicates whether
PatternMatch should be case insensitive when it performs the matching.
The default for this parameter is FALSE, indicating that PatternMatch
should be case sensitive. }

comments: 標準色編輯參數的包裝模塊，包括色相，飽和度，亮度，透明度，對比度，色調和強度。
該模塊是VTSCADA對話框庫的成員，因此必須從吉他上的內部調用，並以\

P”工具（PCHECK框，PCONTRIBUTOR，PCOLORSELECT，PDROPLIST和PEDITFIELD）僅用於配置文件夾和繪圖面板模塊，因此受系統安全限制。此參數工具期望其調用模塊的第一個參數包含指向標籤參數數組的指針。然後，它將通過色相，飽和度，亮度，透明度，對比度，顏色顏色和colorizeInt指示的元素將其設置為匹配輸入字段設置的邏輯值。該模塊提供了一種將顏色編輯添加到面板模塊中的簡便方法。它將默認無效參數。通常的高度：260像素。
snippets: \DialogLibrary.PColorEdit(
Parms, { Required. A pointer to the array of parameters. }
Hue, { The parameter number for the Hue. }
Saturation, { The parameter number for the Saturation. }
Brightness, { The parameter number for the Brightness. }
Transparency, { The parameter number for the Transparency. }
Contrast, { The parameter number for the Contrast. }
ColorizeHue, { The parameter number for the ColorizeHue. }
ColorizeInt, { The parameter number for the Colorize Intensity. }
Title, { An optional parameter that is any expression for a title to
be applied. }
FocusID, { Boolean. If this value is FALSE (0), the field will display
its current setting, but cannot be opened (i.e. its value cannot be
changed), and will appear disabled (grayed-out). }
Trigger { Set when the variable is changed. }

comments: 繪製一個按鈕，該按鈕打開一個顏色選擇對話框和一個顯示當前選擇顏色的區域。
snippets: \DialogLibrary.PColorSelect(
ParmNum, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the parameter
number (from 0) in the caller to alter. }
BtnLabel, { An optional parameter that is any text expression to be
used as a label on the color selection button. }
BtnOnLeft, { An optional parameter that is any logical expression. If
true (non-0) the button will appear to the left of the color display
area, if false (0) it will be to the right. The default value is true.
Standard, { An optional parameter that is any logical expression. If
true (non-0) the button and color display area will be standard system
size, if false (0) they will be sized to fit their boundaries and
VertAlign will be ignored. The default value is true. }
VertAlign { An optional parameter that is any numeric expression that
sets the vertical alignment of the button and display area according
to one of the following options: VertAlign Vertical Alignment 0 Top 1
Center 2 Bottom Note: If Standard is true, this parameter is ignored.
The default value is 0, top alignment. }

comments: 繪製一個拆分列表，顯示所有特定標籤的貢獻者。 }
該模塊是VTSCADA對話框庫的成員，因此必須從吉他上的內部調用，並以\

P”工具（PCHECK框，PCONTRIBUTOR，PCOLORSELECT，PDROPLIST和PEDITFIELD）僅用於配置文件夾和繪圖面板模塊，因此受系統安全限制。此參數工具期望其調用模塊的第一個參數包含一個標籤參數數組。然後，它將將Parmnum指示的元素設置為所選標籤的名稱。對於要設置的任何可選參數，儘管可能是無效的，但必須存在所有可選參數，但必須存在。此功能提供了一個拆分列表，其中包含存儲在HolderName中的所有貢獻者的名稱和描述。雙擊此列表中的項目以獲取標籤的屬性對話框。單擊“添加”按鈕，以添加標籤類型“
convortype”。單擊“刪除”按鈕以終止當前突出顯示的貢獻者的容器/貢獻者關係。以前的貢獻者未從應用程序或數據庫中刪除。通常的身高：200-250像素。
snippets: \DialogLibrary.PContributor(
HolderName, { Required. Any text expression giving the variable name
for container information. }
ContainerObj, { Required. The object value of the container. }
ContribType, { Required. Any text expression giving the contribution
type. }
TagType, { Required. Any text expression for the type of Tag for which
the contributors are being sought. }
Title, { An optional parameter that is any text expression to be used
as a title for the splitlist. }
FocusID, { Required. A parameter that is any numeric expression for
the focus number of the splitlist and its two buttons. The splitlist
will have a focus ID equal to FocusID, the left button will have one
of FocusID + 1, while the right button will have a focus ID of FocusID
+ 2. If FocusID is 0, the splitlist will display its current setting,
but its accompanying buttons will not be able to be selected. }
NoAdd { An Boolean optional expression. Set TRUE when the Add button
is disabled. }

comments: 參數設置Droplist。該模塊繪製了帶有（可選）標題和斜角的滴定列表。
該模塊是VTSCADA對話框庫的成員，因此必須從吉他上的內部調用，並以\
P”工具（PCHECK框，PCONTRIBUTOR，PCOLORSELECT，PDROPLIST和PEDITFIELD）僅用於配置文件夾和繪圖面板模塊，因此受系統安全限制。此參數工具期望其調用模塊的第一個參數包含一個標籤參數數組。然後，它將將Parmnum指示的元素設置為Droplist所選行中顯示的文本字符串。

（未打開的）滴定列表的高度是恆定的，其呼叫變換的水平邊界定義了其寬度，其調用變換的垂直邊界定義了其打開的高度，其中包括斜角的附加高度，但可能包括或不包括標題，根據使用的對準。請注意，如果整個列表可以在呼叫變換的垂直邊界所指示的較小的區域中顯示，則掉落的列表高度將降低。列表的下降高度始終將其最小高度為1線（在場下方）。對於要設置的任何可選參數，儘管可能是無效的，但必須存在所有可選參數，但必須存在。通常的身高：40
snippets: \DialogLibrary.PDropList(
ParmNum, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the parameter
number (from 0) in the caller to alter. }
Title, { Required. Any text expression to be used as a title for the
droplist. }
DataOrAlignTitle, { Required. A flexible parameter that is either an
array of data to display in the droplist, or a logical expression
indicating the alignment of the droplist's title. If this is an array,
the parameter called AlignTitleOrL1 indicates the title alignment. If
this parameter is invalid or numeric, it indicates the title alignment
such that if it is TRUE (non-0) the title is included in the
calculation for vertical alignment, if FALSE (0) it is added to the
droplist after it (and its bevel if one exists) has been vertically
aligned. The default is TRUE. }
CanEdit, { An optional parameter that is any logical expression. If
TRUE (non-0) the text displayed in the droplist can be edited in the
same manner as an editfield, if FALSE (0) it cannot be edited
directly. The default value is FALSE. }
Index, { An optional parameter that is a variable whose value
indicates the array index of the highlighted item in the list. If this
information is not required, a constant may be used. This value will
be used to calculate the initial value displayed in the droplist (see
Init). }
FocusID, { Boolean. If this value is FALSE (0), the field will display
its current setting, but cannot be opened (i.e. its value cannot be
changed), and will appear disabled (grayed-out). }
Trigger, { Optional. If the droplist is editable, Trigger provides
feedback. While editing, the value will be 0. When editing is complete
(tab, enter or loss of focus) the value will change to non-zero, 1 if
enter is pressed, and 2 otherwise. }
Init, { An optional parameter that is any expression for the initial
value displayed in the field. The default value is Parms[ParmNum]. If
Index is invalid, the droplist will initially appear blank. }
DrawBevel, { An optional parameter that is any logical expression. If
true (non-0) a bevel is drawn around the droplist, if false (0) no
bevel is drawn. The default value is true. }
VertAlign, { An optional parameter that is any numeric expression that
sets the vertical alignment of the unopened droplist according to one
of the following: VertAlign Vertical Alignment 0 Top 1 Center 2 Bottom
Whether the title is included when the vertical alignment is
calculated is determined by the value of AlignTitle. The default value
is 0. }

comments: 參數設置EditField。該模塊繪製了一個帶有（可選）標題和斜角的編輯場。注意：在大多數參數為文本的情況下，建議使用PPHRASEEDIT代替Peditfield。
該模塊是VTSCADA對話框庫的成員，因此必須從吉他上的內部調用，並以\

P”工具（PCHECK框，PCONTRIBUTOR，PCOLORSELECT，PDROPLIST和PEDITFIELD）僅用於配置文件夾和繪圖面板模塊，因此受系統安全限制。此參數工具期望其調用模塊的第一個參數包含一個標籤參數數組。然後，它將將Parmnum指示的元素設置為Editfield中的值。編輯場的高度是恆定的，其呼叫變換的水平邊界定義了其寬度，並且其調用變換的垂直邊界定義了要垂直限制的邊界，該邊界將包括附加的高度斜角，但可能包括或不包括標題，取決於標題，取決於使用的對準。通常的高度：45像素。
snippets: \DialogLibrary.PEditField(
ParmNum, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the parameter
number (from 0) in the caller to alter. }
Title, { An optional parameter that is any text expression to be used
as a title for the field. }
DataType, { Defaults to 4 unless otherwise specified. DataType Type 0
Byte (unsigned) 1 Short (2 byte signed) 2 Long (4 byte signed) 3
Double precision floating point (8 byte signed) 4 Text 5 Octal (4 byte
unsigned) 6 Hexadecimal (4 byte unsigned) For types 0 - 2, if the
number entered into the field is prefaced by a "0x" the value is taken
to be hexadecimal format, and if it is prefaced by a "0" it is
considered to be octal. In either case, the value is converted to
decimal format when return is pressed or the focus is lost. For type
5, regardless of whether the number entered into the field is prefaced
by a "0" the value is taken to be octal and will be displayed as such.
The actual type of Variable will be text. Type 6, like type 5 will be
kept in its declared format of hexadecimal regardless of whether the
number entered into the field is prefaced by a "0x". The actual type
of Variable will be text }
6 { FocusID }

該模塊是VTSCADA對話框庫的成員，因此必須從吉他上的內部調用，並以\

comments: 參數設置文件選擇。提供一個用於指定文件名的編輯框以及標籤和瀏覽按鈕。
該模塊是VTSCADA對話框庫的成員，因此必須從吉他上的內部調用，並以\
P”工具（PCHECK框，PCONTRIBUTOR，PCOLORSELECT，PDROPLIST和PEDITFIELD）僅用於配置文件夾和繪圖面板模塊，因此受系統安全限制。此參數工具期望其調用模塊的第一個參數包含一個標籤參數數組。然後，它將將Parmnum指示的元素設置為Editfield中的值。
snippets: \DialogLibrary.PFileChooser(
ParmNum, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the parameter
number (from 0) in the caller to alter. }
Title, { An optional parameter that is any text expression to be used
as a title for the field. Defaults to "" if invalid. }
ButtonLabel, { An optional parameter that is any text expression to be
used as a label for the browse button. Defaults to "..." if invalid. }
ID, { Boolean. If this value is FALSE (0), the field will display its
current setting, but cannot be opened (i.e. its value cannot be
changed), and will appear disabled (grayed-out). }
Trigger, { Required. Trigger provides feedback. While editing, the
value will be 0. When editing is complete (tab, enter or loss of
focus) the value will change to non-zero: 1 if enter is pressed, 2
otherwise. }
View, { Required. Indicates how to display the editfield, as follows.
The default value is 2 if FocusID is 0 and 1 otherwise. View Display
mode 0 Invisible 1 Normal (color scheme - no graying) 2 Grayed-out
(only if FocusID is 0) 3 Non-gray text on a shaded background This
parameter may be used to force an editfield with a FocusID of 0 to
display normally, rather than allowing it to default to its grayed
color. Note that if the FocusID is not 0, setting this value as 2 will
not force the field to gray out. }
Save, { Save Save Mode 0 Open dialog 1 Save dialog -1 Browse for
folder -2 Browser for folder + add trailing "\" }
FilterPattern, { Required text. An array or a semicolon-separated list
of wildcard file patterns for the types that will appear. Defaults to
"" if invalid. }
FilterDesc, { Required text. An array or a semicolon-separated list of
text values describing the corresponding FilterPatterns. Defaults to
"" if invalid. }
DialogTitle, { Required text. The title to apply to the file dialog.
Defaults to "" if invalid. }
ExtensionToUse, { Required text. For save dialogs (Save parameter ==
1) the file extension to use if not specified by the user. Defaults to
"" if invalid. }
DrawBevel, { OptionalBoolean. If TRUE, the bevel is drawn }
VertAlign, { Optional. Any numeric expression that sets the vertical
alignment of the edit field according to one of the following options
VertAlign Vertical Alignment 0 Top 1 Center 2 Bottom Whether the title
is included when the vertical alignment is calculated is determined by
the value of AlignTitle. The default value is 0. }
AlignTitle { Optional Boolean. TRUE if title affects alignment }

comments: { Description: 語言敏感的下降列表。 }
DropList用於選擇一個詞組，通過向用戶提供裝滿翻譯短語的滴定列表來選擇一個短語。如果canedit是正確的，那麼用戶可以輸入新標籤，在這種情況下，它們將被添加到列表中，並將添加到語言清單中。

comments: 語言敏感的編輯場。該模塊繪製了一個帶有（可選）標題和斜角的編輯場。推薦代替舊的編輯功能。
允許用戶輸入多語言短語。輸入是在用戶的活動語言中完成的，並且可以使用彈出對話框編輯應用程序中的所有其他語言。如果鍵入新短語，對話框將自動打開，以允許用戶提供翻譯。如果鍵入現有短語，則如果缺少翻譯，則會出現指示器。在這種情況下，對話框不會彈出。如果輸入具有多個匹配條目（同型）的短語，則將打開一個對話框以允許選擇和修改匹配項。
snippets: \System.PhraseEdit(
X1, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the X coordinate on the
screen of one side of the edit field. }
Y1, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the Y coordinate on the
screen of either the top or bottom of the edit field. }
X2, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the X coordinate on the
screen of the side of the edit field opposite to X1. }
Y2, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the Y coordinate on the
screen of the top or bottom of the edit field, whichever is the
opposite of Y1. }
Title, { Optional. The text expression to be used as a title for the
field. Set Invalid if not shown. }
PhraseID, { Required. Output variable. Set to the phrase ID of the new
text. }
ID, { Boolean. If this value is FALSE (0), the field will display its
current setting, but cannot be opened (i.e. its value cannot be
changed), and will appear disabled (grayed-out). }
Trigger, { Optional numeric. Set when the text changes and provides
feedback as follows. Initially set to Invalid. Set to 0 while the
phrase editor dialog is open Set to Invalid if user opens the phrase
editor manually and does not change the PhraseID Set to 1 if the user
selects a different PhraseID using the phrase editor dialog }
View, { Optional numeric. Directs how to display the editfield , as
follows. View Display mode 0 Invisible 1 Normal (color scheme - no
graying) 2 Grayed-out (only if FocusID is 0) 3 Non-grayed text on a
type 2 background. }
DrawBevel, { Optional Boolean. Set to TRUE to draw a bevel around the
control. }
VertAlign, { Optional numeric. Sets the vertical alignment of the
editfield according to one of the following options: VertAlign
Vertical Alignment 0 Top 1 Center 2 Bottom Whether the title is
included when the vertical alignment is calculated as determined by
the value of AlignTitle. }
2, { AlignTitle }
MinVal, { Optional. The minimum acceptable value. }
MaxVal, { Optional. The maximum acceptable value. }
Style, { An optional parameter indicating the style of the EditField
object. It is a bit-wise field made up of the sum of the following
values, to yield the desired effects. (See: Bitwise Parameters &
Operations ) Bit Value Definition 0 1 Reserved for bit compatibility
with WinComboCtrl, and should be set to "0" 1 2 Reserved for bit
compatibility with WinComboCtrl, and should be set to "0" 2 4 Input is
converted to all uppercase (note 1) 3 8 Input is converted to all
lowercase (note 1) 4 16 Input is masked. Any characters typed will
appear as asterisks. This is useful for such things as password fields
5 32 Multiline editing. Setting this bit causes a typed <CR> (Enter or
Return) to be interpreted as "move to the start of the next line".
Text that contains <CR> characters has a line break inserted at each 6
64 Reserved 7 128 8 256 Reserved 9 512 Not used. Height is defined by
\EditHt or TEditHt (with title). If neither values 4 or 8 are set,
input is passed to script code as typed. }
PrefixValue, { Optional text. An expression that should be displayed
immediately before (i.e. to the left of) the editable part of the
control. }
SuffixValue, { Optional text. An expression that should be displayed
immediately after (i.e. to the right of) the editable part of the
control. No Default }
BGColor, { Optional background color of the edit box }
FGColor, { Optional foreground color of the edit box }
FontParm, { Optional Font value. }
TitleBGColor, { Optional. Background color under title }
TitleFGColor, { Optional. Foreground (text) color of the title. }
BevelColor, { Optional. Color of the bevel line. }
PlaceHolder { Optional text. Information to display in place of
invalid entry. Typically a phrase describing how the field is to be
used. }

comments: 返回指示定位器（例如鼠標）是否已指定其按鈕狀態。 }
如果定位器按鈕組合按按鈕參數指定在定位器位置在“目標”（（x1，y1）
（x2，y2））的邊界內時，此功能將返回true。此功能是“邊緣觸發”的，這意味著它僅作用於定位器按鈕狀態的更改。製作目標區域外按鈕參數指定的按鈕組合，然後將光標滑入目標，不會導致函數返回true。如果未安裝定位器，則該功能將返回false（0）。此功能對於捕獲操作員的快速鼠標按鈕非常有用。
VTSCADA記得按下鼠標按鈕並釋放的位置。實際執行選擇時，實際執行的按鈕不必按下實際按鈕，因為它將檢查自上次執行以來所有按鈕更改的列表。此函數變為真後會鎖定。使用click（）進行穩態反饋，而不是選擇（）。注意：當使用吉特式作為Guistrectch時，該功能將被禁用。
snippets: Pick(
X1, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the X coordinate on the
screen of one side of the screen area ("target"). }
Y1, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the Y coordinate on the
screen of either the top or bottom of the screen area ("target"). }
X2, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the X coordinate on the
screen of the side of the "target" opposite to X1. }
Y2, { Required. Any numeric expression giving the Y coordinate on the
screen of either the top or bottom of the target, whichever is the
opposite of Y1. }
Button { Required. Any numeric expression giving the button
combination that activates this graphic when the locator cursor is
within the "target" screen area. Button Button Locator 0 No buttons 1
Right button 2 Middle button 3 Right and middle buttons 4 Left button
5 Left and right buttons 6 Left and middle buttons 7 All three buttons
If the value is: - multiplied by 8 the meaning for multiple buttons
pressed becomes "OR" rather than "AND." For example, to accept any
button on a 2 or 3 button mouse, use 56 (8 * 7). To accept the left
mouse button regardless of whether the right button is pressed, use 32
(8 * 4) - increased by 64, the function will become true when the
mouse buttons are released rather than when they are pressed -
increased by 128, the button(s) must be double-clicked - increased by
256, forces the control with the input focus (in the same window as
the Pick) to simulate the Enter key being pressed prior to the Pick
function returning a value of true. In other words, with code similar
to: If Pick(X1, Y1, X2, Y2, 0X104); [ â¦script statementsâ¦ ] any
value affected by the control with input focus will be set to the
current value of the control prior to the script statements being run.
- increased by 512, horizontal panning is disabled over the region. -
increased by 1024, vertical panning is disabled over the region. These
last two options, 512 and 1024, allow Pick, WinLocSwitch and other
events to be handled by a region within the window - for example a map
within a Sites page when viewed using the VTScada Anywhere Client.
These should be used only by advanced users. }

comments: 執行PID控制器功能。此功能返回一個控制值，以在給定的設定點上維護參數。
通常，此功能用於設置控製過程輸出點的變量。此功能使用的方程如下。獨立收益方程：CV
= P * E + I *«e dt + d * da/dt
where：cv pid函數輸出。 E錯誤。 E =（SP
-PV）對於正常動作模式，反向動作模式的E =（PV
-SP）。派生選擇。對於基於PV值的導數模式，A =
PV。對於基於誤差值的導數模式，可以通過PLC或其他設備而不是VTSCADA來完成A
I/O驅動程序可以讀取和撰寫設定點，係數等。這種形式的PID控制形式不涉及使用VTSCADA
PID函數。有關更多信息，請參見PLC或其他設備的參考手冊以及VTSCADA
I/O驅動程序手冊。此函數可以通過雙精度浮點值進行計算，並且不支持64位整數計算。
snippets: PID(
PV, { Required. Any numeric parameter which gives the "process
variable" to be maintained at the given setpoint. }
SP, { Required. Any numeric parameter that gives the value to use for
the "setpoint." The PID function will change its return value to make
the PV value match the SP value. }
Mode { Required. Any numeric parameter giving the manual/auto mode for
the function. When the parameter is not equal to 0, the function is in
auto mode and uses the PID algorithm to control the output. When the
parameter is equal to 0, the function simply returns the value of the
Track parameter. When the mode switches from manual to auto, the PID
function implements a "bumpless transfer." This results in a smooth
output change rather than an abrupt change. This is done by forcing
the internal integral to assume a value which forces the PID function
to output a value which matches the Track parameter at the moment of
the change. The integral value will not, however, exceed the value
imposed upon it by the LowLimit and HighLimit parameters. Mode
Algorithm Derivative Gains 0 Manual N/A N/A 1 Normal Uses PV
Independent 2 Normal Uses PV Dependent 3 Normal Uses Error Independent
4 Reverse Uses Error Dependent 5 Reverse Uses PV Independent 6 Reverse
Uses PV Dependent 7 Reverse Uses Error Independent The PID function
operates in eight automatic modes and one manual mode. These modes are
listed in the above table. If in doubt, use mode 1 or 5. The Action
column in the above table indicates whether the PID function operates
using normal action (SP - PV) or reverse action (PV - SP). With normal
action, when PV increases, the function output decreases. With reverse
action, when PV increases, the function output increases also. The
Derivative column in the above table indicates whether the PID
function derivative bases its value upon PV or the error between PV
and SP. For normal action, the error is (SP - PV). For reverse action,
the error is (PV - SP). The difference between the two modes is only
clear when the setpoint (SP) is changed. If the derivative uses PV,
the response to setpoint changes is normal. If the derivative uses the
error, the response to setpoint changes is faster but usually produces
an abrupt change in the PID function output which is often
undesirable. The Gains column in the above table indicates which PID
equation is used. Refer to the "Comments" section for these equations.
The independent gains equation uses seconds as the time base and the
gain parameter (P) does not affect either the integral or derivative.
The dependent gain equation is the ISA equation. It uses minutes as
the time base and the gain parameter (P) affects both the integral and
derivative. }
